mapper.insert: insert into joa_movie values( joa_movie_mov_idx.nextval, #{title}, #{director}, #{cast}, TO_DATE(#{start_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{end_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{country}, #{genre}, #{running_time}, #{rate}, #{info}, #{poster}, 0, 0, 0, 0 )
mapper.update: update joa_movie set mov_title=#{title}, mov_director=#{director}, mov_cast=#{cast}, mov_start_date=TO_DATE(#{start_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), mov_end_date=TO_DATE(#{end_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), mov_country=#{country}, mov_genre=#{genre}, mov_running_time=#{running_time}, mov_rate=#{rate}, mov_info=#{info}, mov_poster=#{poster} where mov_idx=#{idx}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum,a.* from (select * from joa_movie order by mov_idx desc)a)b where rnum>=#{start} and rnum<=#{end}
